name: The Lost Egg
description:
Global Game Jam link: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-egg-8

The lost egg is a roguelike 2D game about an eagle Bill, who is looking for his son in a dangerous Underground. Son is no hero, he is still just an Egg, and he went there by accident (sleepwalked). Help Bill to rescue his precious son before beasts tear him apart. 

Controls: 
WASD / arrow - move
LBM - shot - you can click or just hold (remember about time for reload)

Hint: sometimes a bonus life fall down from enemies / destroyed bushes :)
